casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gregory Aldon PERKINS. No. 332PA14-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. G. Glenn Gerding, Chapel Hill, Attorney at Law, for Perkins, Gregory Aldon. Amy Kunstling Irene, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of October 2015 by Defendant to Appoint the Public Defender:

*753"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
